title: bug_report
description: Used for conversations reporting software bugs or errors encountered by users.

title: technical_support
description: For technical assistance requests related to product usage, troubleshooting or help documents.

title: integration_help
description: Label assigned when users need help integrating our SaaS product with other platforms or APIs.

title: sales_inquiry
description: For leads or clients interested in product offerings, demos, or feature questions.

title: pricing_question
description: To track conversations regarding pricing details, discounts, or subscription tiers.

title: partnership
description: Assigned to inquiries about business partnerships, collaborations, or reseller opportunities.

title: billing_issue
description: For issues related to invoices, payments, refunds, or billing discrepancies.

title: account_setup
description: Conversations that involve assistance with setting up or configuring new accounts.

title: subscription
description: Used for subscription changes, upgrades, downgrades, or renewal questions.

title: technical_team
description: Assigns the conversation to the technical support team.

title: sales_team
description: Routes the conversation to the sales team for further handling.

title: billing_team
description: Forwards the request to the billing department for investigation.

title: product_team
description: Use when product or feature suggestions, feedback, or questions are raised.

title: management_review
description: Assign to tickets that need review or approval from management.

title: legal_review
description: For queries that require legal input or documentation.

title: vip_customer
description: Mark important conversations from VIP or high-value clients.

title: new_customer
description: Conversations from new clients within their first month of service.

title: enterprise_client
description: Used for issues or requests from enterprise-level customers.

title: trial_user
description: Conversations with clients testing the product during a free trial period.

title: premium_subscriber
description: For premium plan subscribers requiring support or account management.

title: feature_request
description: For conversations focused on requests for new product features or enhancements.

title: data_export
description: For support involving data export, backup, or migration requests.

title: security_question
description: Label for security-related queries, concerns, or reports from customers.

title: downtime_report
description: For notifications about product downtime, outages, or service disruptions.

title: onboarding_help
description: When the customer requests onboarding assistance or guidance using the product.

title: usage_report
description: For requests or problems related to usage statistics, analytics, or reporting.

title: payment_update
description: Assigned when a customer needs to update their payment method or billing details.

title: email_issue
description: For customers experiencing email delivery or notification problems.

title: user_invitation
description: For requests related to inviting team members or managing user invitations.

title: plan_upgrade
description: Customer requests regarding upgrading their subscription plan.

title: user_feedback
description: For general feedback, product reviews, or customer satisfaction comments.

title: multi_language
description: Requests involving language support, translation, or localization issues.

title: api_support
description: For questions related to API integration, usage, or documentation.

title: mobile_app
description: Assigned to conversations about the mobile app experience or issues.

title: usage_limit
description: For cases where customers hit usage or resource limits and require support.
